explanation: [0-0] Two identical scenes are shown, one above the other, marked with numbers 1 and 2 in the lower left corner. A cameraman in white and black clothes is standing in a living room with a blue wall and a gray sofa behind him. There is a TV in the living room. Two paintings are hanging on the wall. A computer is placed on a small brown table. The ceiling is white.

[0-4] At this moment, a cameraman in black clothes enters from the door and hands the report card in his hand to the cameraman in white and black. The cameraman in scene one gives the cameraman in black a mobile phone. The cameraman in scene two crumples the report card into a ball, throws it away, and scolds the cameraman in black.
